Text: Grrraaaaarrr!!!
...Grrrr...
Sh-She's strong...!

Those training golems were enhanced to their limit
by Eta... It would take two of us to reliably take them
down!
...They're weak! I'm bored of this training!

I want to fight someone stronger! Where are the
strong prey?!
W-Well...
This better not be going the way I think it is...!
Beta! Epsilon! Fight me!
Wha?!
Oh no...
I-I have to write my novel...
A-And I have a new song to prepare...

Doesn't matter! I'm stronger, so listen to what I
say!
I knew it would come to this...!

...If you're stronger, Delta, then there's no need
to fight, right?

I want to fight! You're weaker, so listen to me!
That's the law of nature!
Wha...? I've never heard of any such law...!

There's no way that kind of reasoning would work
on Delta...
...You seem to be coming along well, Delta.
Lady Alpha!

Lady Alpha! I'm tired of fighting golems! I want to
fight something stronger!

In that case, would you like to go meet stronger
prey?
Huh?!
Awooo! Yes, I do!

Alright, follow me, and I'll brief you on your
mission. Beta and Epsilon, you two can rest.
Yes, ma'am...
We'll do that...
So? So? Lady Alpha, where is this "strong prey"?
Eta, please show her.
Hmm...
Looks like some chunky lizard. Is it really strong?

Despite its looks, it is very strong. Also, I'm
better at drawing than Lady Alpha.
...Well, in terms of realism, yes.

This is the Malak the Malevolent...who happens to be
a dragon.
Dragon... A dragon!
If I defeat it, I'll be just like Boss man!

I'll be a dragon slayer! Then, I'll be number two in
the pack!
Excuse me?!
Eek!
...N-Nothing!
Alright, very well. Eta, continue.

...Being a dragon, it won't die easily. Plus, its
regenerative abilities are...far more advanced
than your average monster.

So...it's like the Mist Dragon! But I can beat it up
like Boss man did!

As the Shadow Garden, we'll need to confirm if it
can be defeated, even if we don't know how to kill
it.

And so, Deltaâ€”I'm tasking you with the mission of
subduing this dragon, Malak the Malevolent.
Whoa..! If it's strong prey, I'll do it!
So, where is it?
Iota will guide you to Madlid. Just follow her.

But...as for how you'll defeat it, that's for you to
carefully prepare.
Prepare? To hunt?
U-Umm...?

It's a dragon. Different from the Cult soldiers,
templars, and monsters you've fought until now.

Even if you plan on overpowering it, make sure you
prepare for how you'll do that.

Think for yourself, come up with your own plan.
Understood?
Is it...necessary...to prepare...?
Absolutely necessary!
Eeek!
O-Okay... I'll...prepare!
